summary: A documentary following the life of Lizzie Velasquez, her triumphant journey to the other side of bullying, and her mission to inspire and empower a more positive online environment.
keywords: bullying|motivational speaker|marfanoid progeroid lipodystrophy syndrome|congenital disease
director: Director: Sara Hirsh Bordo (as Sara Bordo)
title: A Brave Heart: The Lizzie Velasquez Story
